creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: three panels attached together--two rectangular, one L-shaped; left panel is red; central L-shaped panel with abstract design--blue at left with grey and white shell-like shape; right panel with abstract designs in brown, green and yellow-cream
marks: Signature, Title and Date on back, in pencil: [up to now / 1990 / steven sor
title: Up to Now
